metadata.Title: CVE-2018-19478 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
In Artifex Ghostscript before 9.26, a carefully crafted PDF file cantrigger an extremely long running computation when parsing the file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-19478` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ghostscript - 9.26~dfsg+0-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
ghostscript-x - 9.26~dfsg+0-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
libgs9 - 9.26~dfsg+0-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
libgs9-common - 9.26~dfsg+0-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: ghostscript package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '9.26~dfsg+0-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
